title: Cosmic Ordering
description: Have you ever had a dream? Have you ever been down in yourself and not been able to pick yourself up? Have you felt like you were losing a grip on life and felt powerless to face up to things? Now, all of that can change when you use this chakra clearing CD. With this rapid chakra clearing system you will be amazed at how fast you get results.You will see how successful this makes your Cosmic Ordering. When you experience the power within this audio-CD, it will effortlessly energize and restart the energy flow within you.Restart, rebalance and recharge your energy centres (chakras) from head to toe. Power up these dynamos and see the difference this makes to your Cosmic Ordering. Energize yourself and restart the energy flow effortlessly when you experience the power within the audio-CD, which has been specifically designed for followers of Cosmic Ordering. Stephen Richards says 'Chakra clearing is the essential key to successful Ordering and vital in your life's journey of accomplishments'
author: Stephen Richards
